mapper.select: select oobi.* , '' as ord_no from op_ord_bnf_info oobi inner join op_ord_bnf_rel_info oobri on oobi.ord_bnf_no = oobri.ord_bnf_no and oobri.ord_no = #{ordNo}
select oobri.* from op_ord_bnf_rel_info oobri where oobri.ord_no = #{ordNo} and aply_cncl_ccd = '10'
select oci.* from op_clm_info oci where oci.ord_no = #{ordNo} and oci.ord_clm_tp_cd = 'O' and oci.cncl_cnt = 0 and oci.rtgs_cnt = 0
select oci.* from op_clm_info oci where oci.ord_no = #{ordNo} and oci.ord_clm_tp_cd = 'C' and oci.ord_prgs_scd = '20'

select case when (total_price + total_dvp_price - coalesce(total_bnf_price, 0) = opi.pay_amt) then 1 else 0 end payment_check from ( select sum(price.ord_price) as total_price, sum(price.dvp_price) as total_dvp_price, sum(bnf_price) as total_bnf_price from (select oci.ord_amt * oci.ord_cnt as ord_price, ooci.aply_dv_amt as dvp_price, oobri.aply_amt as bnf_price from op_clm_info oci inner join op_ord_cost_info ooci on oci.ord_no = ooci.ord_no and oci.dv_grp_no = ooci.dv_grp_no left outer join op_ord_bnf_rel_info oobri on oci.ord_no = oobri.ord_no and oci.ord_seq = oobri.ord_seq where oci.ord_no = #{clmNo} ) price ) payment , op_pay_info opi where opi.ord_no = #{clmNo}
